name: Physical Lines - Hello Hole
description:
Physical Lines is a easy-to-learn draw physical line game. You need to draw line to let the ball hit the candy. As short as line you draw, you will get more stars. Try to get all 3 stars.

HOW TO PLAY
1. Draw line to let line fall down.
2. Line can pull ball to move.
3. Try to let the ball enter the black hole.
4. Then you will win the game.

FEATURES
1. Tons of manually designed levels 
2. Colorful Dots and UI 
3. 10 skins you can choose.
4. Musical Sound Effects 
5. Free 50 coins, at the first game
6. Simple design and colorful graphics
